title: Saw the Prophet ﷺ‎ in my dream but only from behind, did I really see him? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: if you are able to recognize the prophet alaihissalatu assalam from his facial features as described to us in the authentic sunnah then you have seen the prophet sallallahu failing to have done so because you only saw him from his backside even if everyone around him in the dream told you that this is a prophet this is not the prophet alaihi assalahuasalam
